ST - R - Structural Steel Installation
Chemical anchor proof tests conducted on the sample selected by the MV Engineer
Chemical anchors are tested to 0.7xdesign load
The test load of the bar is provided by the MV Engineer
Proof load tests maintained for a minimum of 30 seconds
The load did not drop more than 10% during the testing

If the proof of tests show failure of the anchors, installation of anchors should stop, cause of failure investigated and installation methodology should be reviewed. If failure is recorded, the minimum test sample shall be increased to 6 specimens or 5% of the total relevant anchor population, whichever is greater.
Mechanical anchor testing conducted on the sample selected by the MV Engineer and witnessed by the MV Engineer
For trubolt or similar anchors the maximum tightening torque is reviewed

If the proof of tests show failure of the anchors, installation of anchors should stop, cause of failure investigated and installation methodology should be reviewed. If failure is recorded, the minimum test sample shall be increased to 6 specimens or 5% of the total relevant anchor population, whichever is greater.

Rib & Infill Installation
Pre-commencement
Rib lifting plan confirmed, correct chains and hooks verified.
Propping layout confirmed as "issued for construction" with contractor and attached.
Floor area cleared for propping to be erected.
Rib grid layout confirmed with contractor and drawing attached.
Rib Installation
Rib inspection results received from the contractor
Ribs placed as per layout.
All ribs visually supported as per plan, no visual damage. Ready for infill panels.
Infill Panel Installation
Infill panel inspection results received from the contractor
Infill boards constructed as panels, including 'backbone', 6 to 10 boards in length and fitted tightly between the ribs
Infill panel adjacent ends are joined, locked with timber blocks to prevent lateral movement, and secured to wall supports
No obvious visual defects on infill boards, no knots, no cracks or other weakness across 25% of the width.
Completion
All propping below timber infill complete
Handrails installed on all edges (top of slab)
All penetrations closed or exclusions in place
Pass to indicate agreement to proceed to lay reinforcing.
Raise Remedial if failed
